author: Tripp Mickle
title: Apple Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Apple Inc. is scheduled to report results for its fiscal second quarter after the market closes Tuesday. Here’s what you need to know.
EARNINGS FORECAST: Earnings of $2.68 a share is the consensus of analysts surveyed by Thomson Reuters, compared with $2.10 a share a year before. The company hasn’t provided earnings guidance for the quarter but in February said it expects gross margin to be between 38% and 38.5% in the quarter.
...
